sections.title: Pre-sale checklist
items: Create an account on the official club website.
Add and verify your payment method.
Confirm time zone and set a reminder 10–15 minutes before on-sale time.

sections.title: On sale
items: Enter the official link and wait in the virtual queue if present.
Select your section/seat and complete the payment.

sections.title: Europe-specific tips
items: Some clubs require name on the ticket; bring photo ID.
Membership may be required for high-demand matches.

sections.title: La Liga notes
items: For big matches, the queue may open 10–30 minutes earlier.

sections.title: Premier League notes
items: Many clubs require a membership to buy at face value.
Some clubs restrict sales to members with purchase history.

sections.title: FC Barcelona steps
items: Create your account on the official ticketing website.
If the match is high demand, expect a longer virtual queue.
Keep your payment method ready; session timeouts can happen.

notes: For El Clásico and similar fixtures, plan to queue earlier.
